title: Champion Mastery Emote Issue/bug
body:
Hi I've unlocked lvl 5 mastery on trynd. And every 2nd game I can't use the emote (default: crt +6). I can use it one game fine no issues. The next game I play I can't use it it says _you have not unlocked this champion emote/mastery yet_ or something along that lines. I can't use it for the entire of that game.  

If I play a game after taht it works again, but then doesnt work the next game.

Thanks

replies.body:
Not trying to get heat for necroing this thread, but having the same issue with Ryze.

EDIT: NVM, just cleared up.

lol you can't necro stuff here because of it's config

RIP forums

Hi TryndOP,

Thanks for sharing the problem, I've noted this among a list of issues some players are having with Champion Mastery emotes and am in talks with other Rioters to get to the bottom of it.

That would be great, I'm level 5 Talon and my friend is a level 5 bard, since the last patch our loading screen and in game banners are gone and the emote is unusable. It's a little lame considering we worked hard for it, but I understand this stuff happens; I hope you find the fix soon.
Thanks dude, we've determined the cause and should have it sorted out tomorrow morning.
